column4: why did my X-Chat system tray icon suddenly appear floating in the upper-left corner of my screen, in a little box?
nope. sometimes out of nowhere one of the items in my system tray appears somewhere else in a little box that i can minimize, maximize, and close
Well, I've had that happen, I always thought it was b/c of beryl, but what I do is, force-quit that box...then remove my panel notification app and re-add it...and restart nm-applet
